Description_lang: $@spellname309569 players can redirect the orb by touching it, causing the orb to drift in the direction they are facing.If the orb touches a non-$@spellname309569 player, they suffer $@spellname309654. If the orb touches Queen Azshara, a ritual obelisk, or the edges of the chamber, it triggers $@spellname306876.When the orb touches an open portal it is consumed by the Void, dispersing harmlessly.
